body_html:
Actually, I have some more insight to add, since by trying something else I have discovered that the issue is not with the OS, but it has to do with whether you are using a GPU or not. Running the same code on Linux (for instance in Colaboratory) will throw the same error about -1 values if you disable GPU support.

Hope this further helps to nail down the issue.

body:
Actually, I have some more insight to add, since by trying something else I have discovered that the issue is not with the OS, but it has to do with whether you are using a GPU or not. Running the same code on Linux (for instance in Colaboratory) will throw the same error about -1 values if you disable GPU support. 

Hope this further helps to nail down the issue.
